title: Excuse shown to Attendance criteria
content: How strict is the Attendance criteria in PES EC campus. Is it lenient or is it enforced rigorously. Will a little amount of attendance shortage be waivered off?

comments.body: I'm waiting for seniors to answer. My chem lab attendance is 67% and I can't get it over 85 before isa ༎ຶ⁠‿⁠༎ຶ
Attendance is not considered for giving isas. Try to maintain 80% by the end of the semester, though they are quite lenient regarding attendance in 1st sem
What if you don't have any medical certificate?

Thank you so much for replying !
I thought I was gonna miss ISA..

It's still chill. I think they call ur parents and would cover for ur attendance  by taking extra classes in the last preparaion week before esas.eventually they too let u write the esa .
I am in 2nd year and didn't see any of my friends/ classmates getting barred from writing esa due to attendance shortage in 1st year.
Adding to this: they're usually a little relaxed towards first years or if you're attendance is only a little below the cutoff. If the cutoff is 80% and you have <70%, then it's an issue.

sometimes they have asked people to submit affidavit (bond paper) stating u wont get less attendance from next sem.

this is what one of my friends had to do, but he had a genuine reason so maintain above the cutoff  so u dont have to roam around 100 offices to get ur work done during esa .
near hosa road there is doctor who gives medical certificate for  100 rs , take that in case of emergency , teachers accept that .
